trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 때 호출 되는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> 개체가 처리를 완료 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use an InstanceContextIdleCallback to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime that an InstanceContextIdleCallback object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: InstanceContextIdleCallback 알리기 위해 사용 하 여는 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 런타임 InstanceContextIdleCallback 개체가 완전히 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the InstanceContextIdleCallback object notifies the runtime that the InstanceContextIdleCallback has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> once again.
trans-unit.target: InstanceContextIdleCallback 개체는 InstanceContextIdleCallback 해당 작업을 완료 되었음을 런타임에 알립니다 때 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 호출 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>다시 한 번.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 이 주기까지 계속 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>반환 `true` 컨텍스트 닫았다가 재활용할 및.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
